en: When Ulko feels he's walked far enough, he stops and releases his pet bird Rey from his bag.

speaker: ulko
en: I didn't want them to think that I speak to birds.

speaker: ulko
en: Yes. But I know you're not real, so it doesn't count.

speaker: rey
en: If I'm not real, what's the point in keeping me hidden?

speaker: ulko
en: I already regret letting you out.
